intro: Psychotria glabristipula, commonly known as the velvet psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of Central and South America, particularly in countries like Colombia and Ecuador. The plant is characterized by its dark green, glossy leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in rainforests. Psychotria glabristipula is also known for its psychoactive properties due to the presence of alkaloids such as psychotamine.
